S06pplg1__u:1_0_0: [LPG_1r] siddhaṃ namaḥ sarvajñāya evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasamaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrākūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena
S06pplg1__u:1_0_1: sārdhaṃ paṃcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
S06pplg1__u:1_0_2: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_0_3: sarvacetovaśitāparamapāramiprāptair ekapudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yad utāyuṣmantam ānandam* śaikṣaṃ srotāpannaṃ paṃcamātraiś ca
S06pplg1__u:1_0_4: bhikṣuṇīśatair yaśodharāmahāprajāpatīpramukhaiḥ saṃbahulaiś copāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sarvair dṛṣṭadharmabhiḥ mahatā ca bodhisatvasaṃghena
S06pplg1__u:1_0_5: sārdham aprameyāsaṃkhyeyair bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ samādhipratilabdhaiḥ śunyatāvihāribhir
S06pplg1__u:1_0_7: mahābhijñāvikrīḍitair atyantācyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair akusīdair ārabdhavīryaiḥ kāyajīvitanirapekṣair akuhakair alapakair
S06pplg1__u:1_0_11: pūrvālāpibhiḥ vyapagatabhrukuṭikaiḥ ślakṣṇamadhuvacanaiḥ gāthābhigītaparālapanakuśalaiḥ anācchedyapratibhānair anantaparṣadabhibhavanair
S06pplg1__u:1_2: ratnākareṇa ca / ratnagarbheṇa ca / ratnadattena ca / susārthavāhena ca / naladattena ca / guhapuptena ca / varuṇadevena cendradevena ca /
S06pplg1__u:1_4_0: mārabalapramardinā ca / vajramatinā ca / ratnamudrāhastena ca / nityotkṣiptahastena ca / mahākaruṇācintinā ca / mahāvyūhena
S06pplg1__u:1_4_1: ca / vyūharājena ca / merukūṭena ca / maitreyeṇa ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena etaiś cānyaiś cānekair bodhisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_4_2: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṃkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ
S06pplg1__u:1_4_3: smṛtim upasthāpya tatra niṣadya samādhirājo nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt* yatra samādhau sarvasamādhayo 'ntargatā anupraviṣṭāḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_5: atha bhagavāṃ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃs tataḥ samādher vyutthāya divyena cakṣuṣedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vyavalokayati sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_6: vyavalokya sarvakāyāt prabhāṃ prāmuñcat* tasyādhastāt padatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma :
S06pplg1__u:1_7: daśabhyaś ca pādāṃgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_8_0: evaṃ dvābhyāṃ gulphābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jaṃghābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyām* kaṭer nābhimaṇḍalāt* dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyām*
S06pplg1__u:1_8_1: hṛdaye śrīvatsāt mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt* saṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_9: daśabhyo hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaraṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_10_0: evan dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyām* dvābhyām āṃsābhyām* grīvāyāś catasṛbhyo [LPG_2v] daṃṣṭrābhyaś catvāriṃśato dantebhyaḥ dvābhyāṃ cakṣubhyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:1_10_1: dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyām* dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇapuṭebhyām* madhye bhruvorṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt* mukhadvārāc ca ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06pplg1__u:1_11_0: sarvāṇi ca tāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvāvantam imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mahatāvabhāsena spharitvā
S06pplg1__u:1_11_1: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_12: evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samaṃtād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_13: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tena raśmyavabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:1_14_0: atha bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur mahatāvabhāsena
S06pplg1__u:1_14_1: sphuṭo 'bhūt* pūrvasyāṃ ca diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām
S06pplg1__u:1_14_2: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭāt* yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo mahatāvabhāsena
S06pplg1__u:1_14_3: sphuṭā abhūvan* yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tenāvabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:1_15: atha bhagavān punar api yā sā tathāgatasya prakṛtiprabhā tayā prabhayemaṃ [LPG_3r] trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_16: pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_17: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭāt* yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātuṃs tena mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_18: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tenāvabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:1_19_0: atha bhagavān mukhadvārāj jihvendriyaṃ nirṇamayya sarvāvantam imaṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa spharitvā
S06pplg1__u:1_19_1: smitaṃ prādurakārṣīt* tataś ca jihvendriyād anekāni nānāvarṇāni raśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_20: sarvatra ca raśmyāṃ nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni santiṣṭhante sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_23: tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgatavigrahā niṣaṇṇā dharman deśayaṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_24: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanāṃ te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn gacchanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_26_0: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat
S06pplg1__u:1_26_1: samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn gacchanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_28: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* yaiś ca satvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:1_29: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma buddhasamādhiṃ samāpadya tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_30: yathārūpeṇardhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ [LPG_3v] ṣaḍvikāram akaṃpata prākaṃpata saṃprākaṃpata /
S06pplg1__u:1_31_0: avedhat* prāvedhat* saṃprāvedhat* acalat prācalat saṃprācalat* akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat* agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat*
S06pplg1__u:1_32: madhye 'vanamati sma / madhya aunnamati smānteṣv avanamati sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_33_0: snigdhaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sarvasukhasaṃjanano 'bhūt* atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena yāvanto 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06pplg1__u:1_33_1: narakatiryagyoniyamalokākṣaṇāpāyadurgativinipātās te sarve samucchinnā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyai
S06pplg1__u:1_33_2: upapannā abhūvan* cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ ca devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ
S06pplg1__u:1_33_3: devānāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapannā abhūvan* atha te manuṣyās te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti
S06pplg1__u:1_34: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtā bhagavantaṃ namasyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_35_0: evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād
S06pplg1__u:1_35_1: daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvanarakāḥ sarvatiryagyonayaḥ sarvayamalokā samucchinnāḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_35_2: sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapadyante sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_36: atha te manuṣyās te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_37_0: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti
S06pplg1__u:1_37_1: tān upasaṃkramanti smopasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtās tāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān namasyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_38: atha tena kṣaṇena ye 'smiṃs [LPG_4r] trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ satvās te 'pi sarve cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_46_0: rogaspṛṣṭā vigatarogā abhūvan* vikalendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā abhūvan* klāntakāyā aklāntakāyā abhūvan* avirahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmantājīvā
S06pplg1__u:1_47_0: sarvasatvāś ca sarvasatveṣu samacittā abhūvan* yad uta mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginīsamacittāḥ mitrajñātisahāyasamacittāḥ sarvasatvā
S06pplg1__u:1_47_1: daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatā abhūvan* brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmagandhāḥ sarvākuśalavitarkavigatāḥ sarvasatvās tasmin
S06pplg1__u:1_47_2: samaye sarvasukhasamarpitā abhūvan* evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samanvāgatās tadyathā tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoḥ sukhaṃ sarvasatvāś
S06pplg1__u:1_47_3: ca tasmin samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā abhūvan* yad evaṃ jānaṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_48: sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu satyam /
S06pplg1__u:1_49: sādhv apramādaḥ sādhu maitrī sādhu karuṇā sādhv avihiṃsā prāṇibhūteṣu /
S06pplg1__u:1_50_0: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ sasumeruṃ sacakravāḍaṃ sadevabhavanaṃ
S06pplg1__u:1_50_1: sendrakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ savaśavartinaṃ saśuddhāvāsaṃ sadevadānavakāyam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate ābhayā
S06pplg1__u:1_51_0: tadyathāpi nāma balavān divākaraḥ pariśuddhe gaganatale paurṇamāsyāṃ vā candramaṇḍalam* evam eva bhagavān pūrvasyān diśi
S06pplg1__u:1_51_1: gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn abhibhūya dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām [LPG_4v] adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
S06pplg1__u:1_51_2: dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śriyā tadyathāpi
S06pplg1__u:1_51_3: nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvāṃs tadanyān parvatān abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate /
S06pplg1__u:1_52: tadyathāpi nāma candramaṇḍalam* sarvāṇi tārārūpāṇy abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsati tapati virocate /
S06pplg1__u:1_53: tadyathāpi nāma sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvāṃs tadanyān avabhāsān abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /
S06pplg1__u:1_54: evam eva bhagavān daśasu dikṣu sadevakaṃ sendrakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśuddhāvāsam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā :
S06pplg1__u:1_55: punar yādṛśaṃ bhagavataḥ prakṛtyātmabhāvopadarśanaṃ tādṛśam iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv upadarśayati sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_56_0: atha yāvanto 'smiṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devanikāyāḥ yāvad brahmakāyikā paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_56_1: nirmāṇaratayaḥ tuṣitā yāmās trāyastriṃśāś cāturmahārājakāyikā devanikāyās te sarve siṃhāsananiṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti
S06pplg1__u:1_57_0: te tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā divyāni puṣpāṇy ādāya divyāni mālyāni divyān gandhān divyāni vilepanāni
S06pplg1__u:1_59: divyāny ābharaṇāni / divyāni cchatrāṇi divyāṃ dhvajān* divyāḥ patākā gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_60: upasaṃkramya taiḥ puṣpādibhir yāvac chatradhvajapatākābhir bhagavantam avakiranti smābhyavakiranti
S06pplg1__u:1_61_0: smābhiprakiranti sma / ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyā vineyā bhājanībhūtās te jalajasthalajāni puṣpāṇi
S06pplg1__u:1_61_1: gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramya tathāgatam abhipūjayaṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_62: [LPG_5r] sarvāṇi ca tāni puṣpādīni yāvac chatradhvajapatākā bhagavaty avakīrṇāni /
S06pplg1__u:1_63_0: samanantaram eva bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātupramāṇo bhagavata upari vaihāyase mūrdhasandhau mahāpuṣpādikūṭāgāraḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_63_1: saṃsthito 'bhūt* tataś ca kūṭāgārād divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni pralaṃbante sma pralaṃbante smābhipralaṃbante sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_64: taiś ca puṣpapaṭṭadāmābhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsenātyarthaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /
S06pplg1__u:1_65_0: yathā cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan*
S06pplg1__u:1_65_1: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ spuṭāś cābhūvan*
S06pplg1__u:1_65_2: tatra jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakadarśanam atmabhāvan dṛṣṭvaivam abhavat* asmākaṃ purataḥ tathāgato niṣaṇṇo
S06pplg1__u:1_66_0: yathā jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇām evaṃ godānīyānāṃ pūrvavidehakānām uttarakauravāṇāṃ cāturmahārajakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvad
S06pplg1__u:1_66_1: aghaniṣṭhānān devānāṃ evaṃ sāhasre lokadhātau dvisāhasre trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasatvānām etad abhūt* asmākaṃ
S06pplg1__u:1_67_0: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayā punar evāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro
S06pplg1__u:1_67_1: lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt* yenāvabhāsena ya iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:1_67_2: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān paśyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:1_68_0: tatra ca pūrvasyān diśi ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ
S06pplg1__u:1_68_1: ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ sabhikṣusaṃghaparivāram adrākṣur yathā ca pūrvasyān diśy evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ [LPG_5v] paścimāyām uttarasyām
S06pplg1__u:1_68_2: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pplg1__u:1_68_3: lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ sabhikṣusaṃghaparivāram adrākṣuḥ /
S06pplg1__u:1_69_0: / atha pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro
S06pplg1__u:1_69_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
S06pplg1__u:1_70_0: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ taṃ ca
S06pplg1__u:1_70_1: tathāgatātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā yena sa bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgatas tenopasaṃkrānta-r-upasaṃkramya taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnākaraṃ
S06pplg1__u:1_70_2: tathāgatam etad avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya
S06pplg1__u:1_71_0: evam ukte bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgatas taṃ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat* eṣa kulaputra paścimāyān diśi
S06pplg1__u:1_71_1: sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati /
S06pplg1__u:1_73_0: tasyaiṣa īdṛśo 'nubhāva atha samantaraśmir bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnākaraṃ tathāgatam etad avocat* gaccheyam
S06pplg1__u:1_73_1: ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāl lokadhātum tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya
S06pplg1__u:1_74: teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kumārabhūtānāṃ dhāraṇīpratisaṃvitpratilabdhānāṃ samādhisamāpattivaśitāpratilabdhānāṃ sa bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgata /
S06pplg1__u:1_75: āha / gaccha tvaṃ [LPG_6r] kulaputra 'sya śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
S06pplg1__u:1_76_0: atha ratnākaras tathāgataḥ suvarṇanirbhāsānāṃ sahasrapatrāṇāṃ padmānāṃ sahasraṃ samantaraśmaye bodhisatvāya mahasatvāya prādāt*
S06pplg1__u:1_76_1: imaiḥ kulaputra padmais taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham abhyavakira saṃprajānaccārī ca kulaputra
S06pplg1__u:1_76_2: tatra buddhakṣetre bhaves tat kasya hetoḥ durāsadā hi kulaputra te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye tatra lokadhātāv upapannā mā tatra
S06pplg1__u:1_77_0: atha samantaraśmir bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tasya bhagavato ratnākarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāt tāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni
S06pplg1__u:1_77_1: sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni gṛhītvānekair bodhisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakadārikārūpaiś
S06pplg1__u:1_77_2: ca tato buddhakṣetrād antarhitaḥ yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dṛyante yāpayaṃti /
S06pplg1__u:1_78_0: tān sarvān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan* puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanair yāvac chatradhvajapatākābhir mahatyā
S06pplg1__u:1_78_1: bodhisatvardhyā mahatā bodhisatvānubhāvena yena sa bhagavāṃc chākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrānta-r-upasaṃkramya
S06pplg1__u:1_78_2: bhagavataḥ śākyamunes tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthād ekāntasthitaḥ samantaraśmir
S06pplg1__u:1_78_3: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat* ratnākaro bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavato 'lpāvādhatāṃ
S06pplg1__u:1_78_4: paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ balaṃ ca sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S06pplg1__u:1_79: imāni ca tena bhagavatā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni prahitāni /
S06pplg1__u:1_80_0: bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe / atha bhagavāṃs tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā
S06pplg1__u:1_80_1: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tenākṣaipsīt* atha taiḥ padmais te sarve lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā 'bhūvan* tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgatavigrahā
S06pplg1__u:1_82: yaiś ca satvaiḥ sā dharmadeśanā śrutā te niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:1_83: te 'pi gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāś ca dārakadārikāś ca svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlais tathāgataṃ satkurvanti sma gurukurvanti sma mānayaṃti
S06pplg1__u:1_84_0: sma pūjayanti sma /// evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātuḥ sarvaśokāpagatā
S06pplg1__u:1_84_1: nāma tatrāśokaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra vigataśoko nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva
S06pplg1__u:1_85: / evaṃ paścimāyān diśy upaśāntā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra ratnārcir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati /
S06pplg1__u:1_86: tatra cāritramatir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:1_87_0: / uttarasyān diśi jayā nāma lokadhātus tatra jayendro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra
S06pplg1__u:1_87_1: jayadatto nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:1_88_0: / evam uttarapūrvasyān diśi samādhyalaṃkṛtā nāma lokadhātus tatra samādhihastyuttaraśrīr nāma tahāgatas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate
S06pplg1__u:1_88_1: yāpayati tatra vijayavikrāmī nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:1_89_0: / pūrvadakṣiṇasyān diśi bodhimaṇḍālaṃkārasurucirā nāma lokadhātus tatra padmottaraśrīr nāma tathāgatas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate
S06pplg1__u:1_89_1: yāpayati tatra padmahasto nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:1_90: / dakṣiṇapaścimāyān diśi vigatarajaḥsaṃcayā nāma lokadhātus tatra sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīr nāma tathāgatas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
S06pplg1__u:1_91: tatra sūryapratibhāso nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:1_92: / paścimottarasyān diśi vaśībhūtā nāma lokadhātus tatraikacchatro nāma tathāgatas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra ratnottamo nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvo yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:1_93: / [LPG_7r] adhastāddiśi padmā nāma lokadhātus tatra padmaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
S06pplg1__u:1_94_0: tatra padmottaro nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* upariṣṭāddiśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya
S06pplg1__u:1_94_1: yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātur nandā nāma tatra nandaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati /
S06pplg1__u:1_95: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
S06pplg1__u:1_96_0: atha tatra lokadhātau nandadatto nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ taṃ ca tathāgatātmabhāvan
