S06pplg1__u:1_109_0: // atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātū ratnamayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt* vicitrapuṣpābhikīrṇo 'vasaktapaṭṭadāmāgandhaghaṭikānirdhūpitaḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_109_1: sarvapuṣpagandhavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitaḥ tadyathāpi nāma padmāvatī lokadhātuḥ samantakusumasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
S06pplg1__u:1_109_2: buddhakṣetraṃ yatra maṃjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prativasati susthitamatiś ca devaputro 'nye ca mahaujaskā bodhisatvāḥ mahāsatvā
S06pplg1__u:3_0_0: yadā ca bhagavān ājñāsīt sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samāgataṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīprajāḥ sadevamānuṣīs tāṃś ca bodhisatvān
S06pplg1__u:3_0_1: mahāsatvān* yadbhūyastvena kumārabhūtān tadā bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram āmantrayata :
S06pplg1__u:3_1_0: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākāram sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
S06pplg1__u:3_1_1: evam ukte ayuṣmāṃc chāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān abhisaṃboddhukāmena
S06pplg1__u:3_1_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat* iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena
S06pplg1__u:3_1_3: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā asthānayogena dānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā aparityāgayogena [LPG_8v] deyadāyaparigrāhakānupalabdhitām
S06pplg1__u:3_7: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śāradvatīputra sthitvā bodhisatvena mahāsatvena catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayitavyāni smṛtyanupalabdhitām upādāya /
S06pplg1__u:3_9_0: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ paṃcendriyāṇi paṃca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaḥ paripūrayitavyaḥ śunyatāsamādhir ānimittaḥ
S06pplg1__u:3_9_1: samādhir apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ paripūrayitavyaḥ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni /
S06pplg1__u:3_10: catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayaḥ paṃcābhijñā nava saṃjñāḥ vyādhyātmakasaṃjñā :
S06pplg1__u:3_11_0: vipaṭumakasaṃjñā / vipūtikasaṃjñā : vilohitakasaṃjñā : vinīlakasaṃjñā : vikhāditakasaṃjñā : vikṣiptakasaṃjñā : asthikasaṃjñā
S06pplg1__u:3_11_1: : vidagdhakasaṃjñā : buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtiḥ saṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtis tyāgānusmṛtir devatānusmṛtir ānāpānānusmṛtir
S06pplg1__u:3_12: anātmasaṃjñā / aśubhasaṃjñā maraṇasaṃjñā sarvatra loke anabhiratisaṃjñā /
S06pplg1__u:3_14_0: duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ
S06pplg1__u:3_14_1: paricayajñānaṃ yathāvajjñānam* savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir avitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ avitarkaḥ [LPG_9r] avicāraḥ samādhir
S06pplg1__u:3_14_2: anājñātamājñāsyāmītīndriyam ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyam abhibhvāyatanaṃ kṛtsnāyatanaṃ catvāri saṃgrahavastūni /
S06pplg1__u:3_15: catvāri vyavasthānāni / daśa bhūmayo daśa caryā daśa kṣāntayo viṃśatir adhyāśayāḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ /
S06pplg1__u:3_16_0: śamathavipaśyanājñāne / tisro vidyā catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ catvāri vaiśāradyāny acyutāḥ paṃcābhijñāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ sapta
S06pplg1__u:3_16_1: dhanāny aṣṭau mahāpuruṣavitarkā nava satvāvāsā daśa tathāgatabalāny aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā sarvākāravaropetaṃ
S06pplg1__u:3_16_2: sarvajñajñānam abhisaṃboddhukāmena mārgākārajñatāṃ sarvajñatāṃ sarvasatvacittacaritajñānākāratāṃ paripūrayitukāmena bodhisatvena
S06pplg1__u:3_16_3: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ sarvavāsanānusandhikleśān prahātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:3_16_4: yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:3_17: / bodhisatvanyāmaṃ śāradvatīputrāvakrāntukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:3_18: / śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī prajñātukāmena te ca bhūmī atikrāntukāmenāvaivartikabhūmau ca sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:3_19_0: / ṣaḍabhijñatāyāṃ sthātukāmena sarvasatvacittacaritavispanditāni jñātukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānam abhibhavitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:3_19_1: tathā dhāraṇīmukhasamādhimukhaṃ pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:3_20_0: / sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitrīṇāṃ ca dānaṃ dadatāṃ yāvat prajñāṃ bhāvayatām ekānumodanāsahagatena
S06pplg1__u:3_20_1: cittotpādena sarvaṃ tat kuśalamūlam abhibhavitukāmena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanam
S06pplg1__u:3_22: / alpaṃ dānaṃ dadataḥ pariṇamanāyogena katham aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāpramāṇāparimāṇaṃ bhaved iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:3_23_0: / evam alpaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣato kṣāntiṃ bhāvayato 'lpaṃ vīryam ārabhamāṇasyālpaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasyālpaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ
S06pplg1__u:3_23_1: pariṇamanāyogena katham aprameyam asaṃkhyeyāpramāṇāparimāṇaṃ bhaved iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:4_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dānapāramitāyāṃ sthātukāmena dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:4_8: dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam* prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:4_9: / kathaṃ me sarvatra jātau buddhavigrahadarśanaṃ bhaved buddhacodanā /
S06pplg1__u:5_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra buddhakāyaṃ pariniṣpādayitukāmena dvātriṃśataṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena
S06pplg1__u:5_0_1: mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* aśītim anuvyaṃjanāni pratilabdhukāmena sarvatra jātau jātismaratāṃ bodhicittāvipraṇāśatāṃ
S06pplg1__u:5_1: sarvapāpamitrapāpasahāyān vivarjayitukāmena sarvabuddhabodhisatvakalyāṇamitrāṇy ārāgayitukāmena sarvamāramārakāyikadevatān nirjetukāmena sarvāvaraṇīyāni viśodhayitukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:5_2: sarvadharmānāvaraṇatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:5_3: / bodhisatvakulaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena buddhakulam ārāgayitukāmena triratnavaṃśānupacchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:5_4_0: / kumārabhūmim anuprāptukāmena buddhabodhisatvair avirahitena bhavitukāmena bodhisatvabhūmīr atikrāntukāmena kṣipraṃ tathāgatabhūmīṃ
S06pplg1__u:5_5_0: / yaiś ca kuśalamūlair yair ākārair ākāṃkṣed buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni me kuśalamūlāni
S06pplg1__u:5_5_1: ta ākārāḥ samṛddhyeyur iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:5_7_0: annena pānena yānair vastrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiḥ śayanair āsanair upāśrayair glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
S06pplg1__u:5_7_1: sarvopakaraṇaparibhogaiḥ sarvasatvān saṃtarpayiṣyāmīti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:6_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvāsatvās tān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:6_1_0: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu paṃcasv abhijñāsu triśaraṇagamane buddhadharmasaṃghaprasādapratilaṃbhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:6_2: / ye vā te gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvān mahāyāne samādāpayitukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:6_3_0: dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:7_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ekam api kuśalacittotpādam akṣayaṃ kartukāmena bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*/
S06pplg1__u:8_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām
S06pplg1__u:8_0_1: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te me varṇaṃ
S06pplg1__u:8_0_2: bhāṣerann iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:9_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāni pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi tāni sarvāṇy ekacittotpādenopasaṃkrāntukāmena
S06pplg1__u:9_1_0: / evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi
S06pplg1__u:9_1_1: tāni sarvāṇy ekacittotpādenopasaṃkrāntukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:10_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ekasvaraghoṣeṇa pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vijñapayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:10_1_0: / evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālikopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi
S06pplg1__u:11_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra buddhotpādānupacchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvakulam ārakṣitukāmena buddhavaṃśānucchedāya sthātukāmena
S06pplg1__u:11_3_0: asaṃskṛtaśunyatāyāṃ / atyantaśunyatāyāṃ / anavarāgraśunyatāyāṃ / anavakāraśunyatāyāṃ / prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ / svalakṣaṇaśunyatāyāṃ /
S06pplg1__u:11_4: svabhāvaśunyatāyāṃ / abhāvasvabhāvaśunyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:11_6: tathākāralakṣaṇāny avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:11_7: / sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatām avitathatām ananyatathatām avikāratathatāṃ yathāvattathātam avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:11_8: / sarvadharmāṇān dharmadhātum avaboddhukāmena sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtakoṭim avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:12_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantyas tṛsāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau gaṃgānadīvālukās tāḥ sarvā jñātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:12_1_0: / yas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudreṣv apskandho nadīṣu mahānadīṣu kunadīṣūtsasarastaḍākeṣu palvaleṣu tan
S06pplg1__u:12_1_1: sarvaṃ śatadhābhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣeptukāmena na ca tanniśṛtān prāṇino viheṭhayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
S06pplg1__u:13_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvāṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv agniskandhaḥ sa sarva ekajvālībhūto bhavet tadyathāpi
S06pplg1__u:13_0_1: nāma kalpoddāhe vartamāne tam enam ekena mukhavāyunā nirvāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:14_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yās trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bātamaṇḍalyo yā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vidhunuyur
S06pplg1__u:14_0_1: vikireyur vidhvaṃseyus tadyathāpi nāma busamuṣṭin tāḥ sarvā ekenāṅgulyāḥ prāntakena saṃcchādayitukāmena viṣkaṃbhayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:15_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv ākāśadhātus taṃ sarvam ekaparyaṃkena spharitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:16_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ parvatarājās tān sarvān
S06pplg1__u:16_0_1: ekabālena badhvābhyutkṣipyāprameyān asaṃkhyeyāl lokadhātūn kṣipeyam iti tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:17_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvāṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tṛṇavṛkṣagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo loṣṭadaṇḍaśarkarāpāṣāṇaparvatāmahāpṛthivīsaṃcayas
S06pplg1__u:17_0_1: taṃ sarvaṃ paramāṇurajoyogena jñātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:18_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ sabodhisatvāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās
S06pplg1__u:18_0_2: tān sarvān tathāgatān arhataḥ [LPG_12r] samyaksaṃbuddhān sabodhisatvān saśrāvakasaṃghān satkartukāmena gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:18_1_0: / evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv aikaikasyān diśi ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:18_1_1: lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ sabodhisatvāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās tān sarvān ekapiṇḍapātena pratipādayitukāmenaikapuṣpeṇaikamālyenaikagandhenaikavilepanenaikacūrṇenaikacīvareṇaikacchatreṇaikadhvajenaikapatākayā /
S06pplg1__u:18_2_0: tan sarvāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān sabodhisatvān saśrāvakasaṃghān satkartukāmena gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:19_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvāṃc chīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmenaivaṃ
S06pplg1__u:19_0_1: samādhiskandhe prajñāskandhe vimuktiskandhe vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena evaṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:19_0_2: sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
S06pplg1__u:19_1: / evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvāṃc chīlaskandhe /
S06pplg1__u:19_3_0: vimuktiskandhe vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena evaṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sakṛdāgāmiphale
S06pplg1__u:19_3_1: arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:20_0_0: [LPG_12v] punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvanto daśadigloke sarvalokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānena
S06pplg1__u:20_0_1: ca parinirvāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:21_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ dadatā evaṃ śikṣitavyam* yad evaṃ dānaṃ
S06pplg1__u:21_0_1: datvā mahāphalaṃ bhavaty evaṃ dānaṃ datvā kṣatriyamahāsālakuleṣūpapadyat';
S06pplg1__u:21_3: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad eva dānaṃ niśrāya cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
S06pplg1__u:21_4: evaṃ trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
S06pplg1__u:21_5: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad evaṃ dānaṃ niśrāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyaṃ tritīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam utpādyate ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate /
S06pplg1__u:21_6: vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate evaṃ dānaṃ datvāryāṣṭāṃgo mārga utpādyate /
S06pplg1__u:22_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ jānāty evam upāyakauśalyena dānaṃ dattaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati /
S06pplg1__u:22_1: evaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati /
S06pplg1__u:22_2: // athāyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dānaṃ dadatā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:22_4: bhagavān āha / anupalaṃbhayogena śāradvatīputra [LPG_13r] dānasya dāyakasya parigrāhakasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:23_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputrātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām sarvabuddhaguṇān prajñātukāmenānuprāptukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:24_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāraṃgaṃtukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:24_1: / evaṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ laukikalokottarāṇāṃ rūpyarūpiṇāṃ vyākṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ niyatāniyatānāṃ nairyāṇikānairyāṇikānām /
S06pplg1__u:24_2: hānabhāgīyānāṃ viśeṣabhāgīyānāṃ pṛthagjānadharmāṇāṃ āryadharmāṇāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisatvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ /
S06pplg1__u:24_3: sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃgaṃtukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:25_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatām anuboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
S06pplg1__u:25_1: / sarvadharmāṇām anutpādakoṭim anuprāptukāmena bhūtakoṭiṃ prativeddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:26_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvaṃgamena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:27_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakena [LPG_13v] bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:28_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhyantaraparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:29_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena mahāparivāreṇa bhavatukāmena bodhisatvaparivāraṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:30_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvadātrīṇāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:31_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dāne 'navagṛhītacittena bhavitukāmena dauḥśīlyacittaṃ pṛthakkartukāmena
S06pplg1__u:31_0_1: vyāpādacittam utsraṣṭukāmena kausīdyacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:32_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvasattvān dānamaye puṇyakṛyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena śīlamaye
S06pplg1__u:32_0_1: bhāvanāmaye vaiyāpṛtyasahagate sarvauṣadhikasahagate puṇyakṛyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:33_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākārāṇi paṃca cakṣuṃṣi niṣpādayitukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:33_1: māṃsacakṣur divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur niṣpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
S06pplg1__u:34_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ [LPG_14r] paścimāyām
S06pplg1__u:34_0_1: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas
S06pplg1__u:34_0_2: tān sarvān divyena cakṣuṣā draṣṭukāmena yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śrotukāmena
S06pplg1__u:34_0_3: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñātukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:34_1_0: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvayogasahagatāṃ bodhisatvacaryām anusmartukāmena teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anekavidham
S06pplg1__u:34_1_1: ṛddhividhivikurvitaṃ saṃdraṣṭukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:35_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yan te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:35_0_1: lokadhātuṣu dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ śrutvānācchedyena smṛtibalādhānena sandhārayitukāmena yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha
S06pplg1__u:35_0_2: etasminn antare sarvam avipraṇāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:36_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhīś
S06pplg1__u:37_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit tathāgatena bhāṣitaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānanidānetyuktakajātakavaipulyāvadānopadeśādbhutadharmā
S06pplg1__u:37_0_1: yac chrāvakair na śrutaṃ tat sarvaṃ paryavāptukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:38_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ
S06pplg1__u:38_0_1: bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu yat kiṃcit
S06pplg1__u:38_0_2: sarvabuddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate tat sarvaṃ śrotukāmenodgrahītukāmena [LPG_14v] dhārayitukāmena paryavāptukāmena
S06pplg1__u:38_0_3: pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena tatra ca tathatvāya pratipattukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:39_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhākāratamisrā lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭāḥ
S06pplg1__u:39_0_1: yatremau sūryācandramasāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ maheśākhyāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau na bhāsete na tapato na virocete tāḥ sarvāḥ
S06pplg1__u:39_1_0: / evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu yā andhākāratamisrās tāḥ sarvā
S06pplg1__u:40_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na
S06pplg1__u:40_0_1: saṃghaśabdas tatra lokadhātuṣu tān sarvasatvān buddhadharmasaṃghaśabdāṃc chrāvayitukāmena samyagdṛṣṭau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:40_1: / evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu :
S06pplg1__u:41_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
S06pplg1__u:41_0_1: dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhāḥ satvās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanti badhirāḥ
S06pplg1__u:41_0_2: śrotreṇa śabdāṃ śroṣyanti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma /
S06pplg1__u:41_7_0: / kim iti [LPG_15r] ye tatra samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv akṣaṇāpāyagatāḥ satvā
S06pplg1__u:41_7_1: nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā te mamānubhāvena tataś cyavitvā mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante /
S06pplg1__u:41_8_0: sarvāṃś ca tān satvāṃc chīle pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:41_8_1: srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:42_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena tathāgateryāpathaṃ śikṣitukāmena tathāgatacaryācāritraviśuddhiṃ tathāgatasya
S06pplg1__u:43_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ nāgāvalokitam
S06pplg1__u:43_0_1: avalokayeyaṃ kim ity ahaṃ mahāsiṃhavijṛṃbhitena vijṛmbheyaṃ kim ity aham amoghavikrāmitayā vikrāmeyaṃ kim ity ahaṃ caturaṃgulamātreṇa
S06pplg1__u:43_1: kim ity ahaṃ sahasrapatreṣu pādmeṣu pādatalau nikṣipan gaccheyaṃ pādatalasanniśṛtān prāṇino aviheṭhayan* kim ity ahaṃ sahasrāracakratalābhyāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ vicitrayan gaccheyam /
S06pplg1__u:43_2: / kim ity ahaṃ samantāc cakrapramāṇamātraṃ mahāpṛthivyāḥ parivartayeyaṃ caṃkrame caṃkramyeya kim ity ahaṃ sarvāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anucaṃkramyamāṇaḥ pṛthivīrajasā nānulipyeya /
S06pplg1__u:43_3: kim iti me ekaṃ vā yojanaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā /
S06pplg1__u:43_4: paṃca vā daśa vā viṃśatir vā tṛṃśad vā catvāriṃśad vā paṃcāśad vā yojanaśataṃ vā /
S06pplg1__u:43_5: yāvad yojanasahasraṃ vā / yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā / aprameyāṇi vā asaṃkhyeyāni vā acintyāni vā /
S06pplg1__u:43_6: atulyāni [LPG_15v] vā / anaṃtāni vā aparyantāni vā / amāpyāni vā buddhakṣetrāṇy anuvicarato 'nucaṃkramyamāṇasya na kāyaklame na cittam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:43_7_0: / kim ity aham adhastāt kramatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ cakrabhyāṃ raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pramuṃcan* sarvākṣaṇāpāyaduḥkhāni
S06pplg1__u:43_7_1: praśamayya sarvasatvān sukhitān kuryām iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:44_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ caturmahārājakāyikair
S06pplg1__u:44_0_1: devair yāvad akaniṣṭhair anekair devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkrameyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:45_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:45_1: kim iti me bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣīdataś cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā duṣyasaṃstaraṃ kuryur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:46_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ
S06pplg1__u:46_0_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato niṣaṇṇasya śayānasya sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheta /
S06pplg1__u:47_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam upaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ yatraiva
S06pplg1__u:47_0_1: divase 'bhiniṣkrameyaṃ tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tatraiva divase dharmacakraṃ pravartayeyaṃ
S06pplg1__u:47_0_2: pravartayataś cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśudhyet* aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃm anupādāyāsravebhyaś
S06pplg1__u:47_0_3: cittāni vimucyeran* aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ satvā 'vaivartikā [LPG_16r] bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:48_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam* kim ity me 'nuttarāṃ
S06pplg1__u:48_0_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhavet* ekadharmadeśanayāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā ekāsanikā arhanto
S06pplg1__u:48_0_2: bhaveyur bodhisatvā mahāsatvā sarve avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:48_1_0: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇo bodhisatvasaṃgho bhavet* amitaṃ cāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhavet* amitā prabhāsaṃpad bhaved iti prajñāpāmitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:48_1_1: śikṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohaśabdo 'pi na bhaved iti
S06pplg1__u:48_2: / sarvasatvā evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu brahmacaryaṃ sādhv avihiṃsā sarvaprāṇibhūteṣu /
S06pplg1__u:48_3: kiṃ me parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntardhānaśabdo 'pi na bhavet tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:48_4: / kim iti me saha śravaṇamātreṇa nāmadheyasya gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvā niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:48_5: tena śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:48_6: / yasmiṃc chāradvatīputra samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān guṇān utpādayati /
S06pplg1__u:48_7: tasmin samaye āttamanaskā bhavaṃti catvāro mahārājā vayam atra catvāri pātrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmo yāni paurvakair mahārājaiḥ paurvakeṣu tathāgateṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S06pplg1__u:48_8_0: āttamanaskā bhavanti trāyastriṃśā devā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ āttamanaskā bhavanti paranirmitavaśavartino devā vayam
S06pplg1__u:48_8_1: asyopasthānaparicaryāṃ [LPG_16v] kariṣyāma evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyaṃte divyāḥ kāyā abhivardhiṣyante /
S06pplg1__u:48_9_0: // āttamanaskā bhavanti brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā śubhakṛtsnā bṛhatphalā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā āttamanaskā bhavanti
S06pplg1__u:48_9_1: aghaniṣṭhā devā vayam enam adhyeṣiṣyāmahe dharmacakrapravartanāya /
S06pplg1__u:48_10_0: yasmin samaye śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir āttamanaskās tasmin*
S06pplg1__u:48_10_1: samaye bhavanti kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca vayam asya mahāsatvasya mātāpitarau bhaviṣyāmo /
S06pplg1__u:48_12_0: āttamanaskā bhavanti catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā bodhisatvasyāmaithunasaṃyogaprasthānatāyai sa punar brahmacārī
S06pplg1__u:48_12_1: bhavati satvānāṃ bodhiniyojanatāyai na saṃyojanīyair dharmaiḥ saṃyujyate sa evaṃ praṇidadhāti /
S06pplg1__u:48_14: / tat kasya hetoḥ kāmāṃ khalu punaḥ pratiṣevamāṇasya brahmalokopapattaye-r-antarāyo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:48_16: // tasmāt tarhi bodhisatvena mahāsatvena brahmacāriṇaivābhiniṣkramyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā nābrahmacāriṇā :
S06pplg1__u:48_17: // evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kiṃ punar bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāvaśyaṃ bhāryaputraduhitṛbhir bhavitavyam* bhagavān āha /
S06pplg1__u:48_18_0: keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām avaśyaṃ mātāpitṛbhir bhavitavyam* na bhāryāputraduhitṛbhiḥ keṣāṃcid avaśyaṃ
S06pplg1__u:48_18_1: mātāpitṛbhāryāputraduhitribhir bhavitavyam* keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya
S06pplg1__u:48_18_2: brahmacaryaṃsamādānaṃ bhavati [LPG_17r] te nityaṃ kumārabhūtā eva yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante kecit
S06pplg1__u:48_18_3: punaḥ bodhisatvā mahāsatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipākāya paṃca kāmaguṇān paribhuṃjyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante /
S06pplg1__u:48_19: kecit punaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāpratilabdhā apagatakāmakleśās te satvaparipākāya kāmaguṇaparibhogaṃ cotpādayanti na ca paribhuṃjante /
S06pplg1__u:48_20_0: // tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā suśikṣito māyāvidyāsamyogajñāne sa paṃca kāmaguṇān abhinirmāya
S06pplg1__u:48_20_1: taiḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ramamāṇaṃ krīḍantaṃ paricārayaṃtam ātmānam upadarśayet* tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu tena
S06pplg1__u:48_20_2: māyākāreṇa vā māyākārāntevāsinā vā paṃca kāmāmaguṇāḥ paribhuktā bhaveyur āha /
S06pplg1__u:48_22_0: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā mahāyānamāyāsuśikṣitā māyopamadharmatāvihārapratilabdhāḥ sarvakleśavigatā vineyasatvaparipākāya
S06pplg1__u:48_22_1: mahākaruṇāvaśena kāmaguṇabhogaṃ copadarśayanti na ca kāmaguṇān paribhuṃjyante /
S06pplg1__u:48_23: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti na lipyaṃte anena paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ kāmānām avarṇaṃ bhāṣante /
S06pplg1__u:48_24_0: ādīptāḥ kāmā jugupsitāḥ kāmā vadhakāḥ kāmāḥ pratyarthikāḥ kāmāḥ pratyamitrāḥ kāmāḥ evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ
S06pplg1__u:48_24_1: satvānāṃ paṃcabhyaḥ kāmaguṇebhyo vivecanārthaṃ vicchandanārthaṃ paṃca kāmaguṇān upadarśayaṃti /
S06pplg1__u:48_25: na ca tair mādyanti na pramādyanti /
S06pplg1__u:48_26: na kāmahetor na kāmanidānaṃ [LPG_17v] pāpaṃ karmādhyavasyanti /
S06pplg1__u:48_27: // evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatiputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam* bhagavān āha /
S06pplg1__u:48_28: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatva iti na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:48_33: caratīti na samanupaśyati / na caratīti na samanupaśyati
S06pplg1__u:48_34: / rūpam api na samanupaśyati / vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam api na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:48_35_0: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa bodhisatvo nāmasvabhāvena śunyaḥ na śunyatayā rūpaṃ śunyaṃ na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā na śunyatayā
S06pplg1__u:48_35_1: vijñānaṃ śunyam* nānyatra rūpāc chunyatā nānyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānāc chunyatā /
S06pplg1__u:48_36_0: śunyataiva rūpaṃ śunyataiva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ śunyataiva vijñānaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta
S06pplg1__u:48_36_1: bodhiḥ nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatvaḥ nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta cchunyatā /
S06pplg1__u:48_37: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ /
S06pplg1__u:48_38: tathā hi māyopamaṃ rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā māyopamaṃ vijñānaṃ māyā ca nāmamātraṃ na deśasthā na pradeśasthā :
S06pplg1__u:48_39_0: asad abhūtaṃ vitathasamaṃ māyādarśanaṃ svabhāvarahitaṃ asvabhāvaś cānutpādaḥ anirodaḥ na hānir na vṛddhiḥ na saṃkleśo na
S06pplg1__u:48_39_1: vyavadānam evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utpādaṃ na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:48_40: nirodhaṃ na samanupaśyati / sthānaṃ na samanupaśyati / hāniṃ na samanupaśyati / [LPG_18r] vṛddhiṃ na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:48_41: saṃkleśan na samanupaśyati / vyavadānan na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:48_42: rūpan na samanupaśyati / vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:48_43: bodhir iti bodhisatva iti yad ucyate tad api na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:48_44: tat kasya hetoḥ kṛtriman nāma pratipratidharman te kalpitā āgantukena nāmadheyenābhūtaparikalpitena vyavahṛyante /
S06pplg1__u:48_45: / vyavahārāc cābhiniviśyante / tad bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na manyate /
S06pplg1__u:49_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ vyupaparīkṣate /
S06pplg1__u:49_1: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatva iti nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhir iti /
S06pplg1__u:49_2: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddha iti /
S06pplg1__u:49_4: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti /
S06pplg1__u:49_5: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpam iti /
S06pplg1__u:49_7: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ātmātmeti vyavahṛyate sa ca parigaveṣyamāṇo nopalabhyate /
S06pplg1__u:49_8_0: evaṃ satvo jīvaḥ poṣaḥ pudgalo manujo mānavaḥ kārakaḥ kārāpako vedako vedayitṛkaḥ utthāpakaḥ samutthāpako jānakaḥ paśyakaḥ
S06pplg1__u:49_8_1: sparśako vijānakaḥ sarva ete yathābhūtaṃ parigaveṣyamāṇāḥ sarveṇa sarvan nopalabhyante /
S06pplg1__u:49_11: // evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatvan na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:49_12: bodhin na samanupaśyati / buddhan na samanupaśyati / prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:49_14: rūpan na samanupaśyati / vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānan na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:49_15_0: yena nāmnā vyavahṛyeta / tad api nāmaṃ na samanupaśyaty evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathāgataprajñāṃ
S06pplg1__u:49_15_1: sthāpayitvā sarvās tadanyāḥ prajñā yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā abhibhavaty anupalambhaśunyatām [LPG_18v] upādāya /
S06pplg1__u:49_16: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa tad api na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:49_17_0: yenābhiniviśeta evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputrāyaṃ jaṃbudvīpaḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ
S06pplg1__u:49_17_1: tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravaṇaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya
S06pplg1__u:49_17_2: mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti /
S06pplg1__u:49_18: sahasratamīm api / śatasahasratamīm api / koṭīśatasahasratamīm api / saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate /
S06pplg1__u:49_19: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya yā prajñā sā sarvasatvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇārthāya pratyupasthitā /
S06pplg1__u:50_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yā ekadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā abhibhūya tiṣṭhati /
S06pplg1__u:50_1_0: / tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra jambudvīpaḥ paripūrṇaḥ śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ sacec chāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro
S06pplg1__u:50_1_1: lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇo bhaved yuṣmādṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
S06pplg1__u:50_1_2: śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate /
S06pplg1__u:50_2_0: / tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sacec chāradvatīputra pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ
S06pplg1__u:50_2_1: paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād
S06pplg1__u:50_2_2: yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya
S06pplg1__u:50_2_3: mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitāyāḥ [LPG_19r] prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām
S06pplg1__u:50_3_0: śāradvatīputra āha / yeyaṃ bhagavaṃc chrāvakāṇāṃ prajñā srotaāpannasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāminaḥ arhataḥ yā ca pratyekabuddhasya
S06pplg1__u:50_3_1: bodhisatvasya tathāgatasya cārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya prajñā sarvās tāḥ prajñā abhedaḥ śunyatā viviktāḥ anutpādaprakṛtikāḥ
S06pplg1__u:50_3_2: svabhāvaśunyā na ca bhagavann abhedasya viviktasyānutpādasya svabhāvaśunyasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vopalabhyate /
S06pplg1__u:50_4: tat kathaṃ bhagavan yeyaṃ bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaikadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati /
S06pplg1__u:50_5_0: // bhagavān āha / tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputra yena kāryeṇa bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitā
S06pplg1__u:50_5_1: prajñā pratyupasthitā mayā mārgākārajñatāyāṃ caratā sarvasatvānām arthaṃ kurvatā sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbudhya sarvasatvāḥ
S06pplg1__u:50_5_2: parinirvāpayitavyā api nu tena kṛtyena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pratyupasthitā /
S06pplg1__u:50_6: āha / no hīdaṃ bhagavan* bhagavān āha /
S06pplg1__u:50_7_0: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavaty asmābhir anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06pplg1__u:50_9_0: tad anenāpi te śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam* yeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā yā ca bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya
S06pplg1__u:50_9_1: prajñā imāṃ prajñām upanidhāyaiṣā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti /
S06pplg1__u:50_11_0: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati vayaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya
S06pplg1__u:50_11_1: buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06pplg1__u:50_11_2: paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim [LPG_19v] abhisaṃbuddhyāparimāṇān aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti āha /
S06pplg1__u:50_14_0: mayā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06pplg1__u:50_14_1: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ
S06pplg1__u:50_15_0: / tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra khadyotakasya prāṇikajātasya naivaṃ bhavaty aham ābhayā jambudvīpam avabhāsayeyaṃ mamābhayā
S06pplg1__u:50_15_1: jambudvīpaḥ sphuṭo bhavet* evam eva śāradvatīputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā
S06pplg1__u:50_15_2: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikāṃ buddhadharmān paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:50_16: / tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra sūryamaṇḍalam udāgacchat sarvajaṃbūdvīpam avabhāsena spharati /
S06pplg1__u:50_17_0: sarvajambudvīpam avabhāsena sphuṭīkaroti evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran satvān paripācya
S06pplg1__u:50_17_1: buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06pplg1__u:50_18: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramyāvaivartikabhūmīm anuprāpnoti /
S06pplg1__u:50_20_0: // evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat* iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam
S06pplg1__u:50_20_1: upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃc chunyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu [LPG_20r] dharmeṣu sthitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramya
S06pplg1__u:50_21: // śāradvatīputra āha / katamasyāṃ bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:50_22_0: bhagavān āha / prathamacittotpādaṃ śāradvatīputropādāya bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaḥ
S06pplg1__u:50_22_1: atrāntarād bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām agro vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaṃ
S06pplg1__u:50_22_2: mahāsatvam āgamya sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:50_23_0: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ paṃcānāṃ śikṣāpadānām aṣṭāṃgasamanvāgatasya poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām
S06pplg1__u:50_23_1: apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ paṃcānām abhijñānāṃ ṣaṇṇām anusmṛtīnāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ
S06pplg1__u:50_23_2: caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ paṃcānām indriyāṇāṃ paṃcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṃgānām āryāṣṭāṃgasya mārgasya loke prādurbhāvo
S06pplg1__u:50_24: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:50_25: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:50_26: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvāt* kṣatriyamahāsālakulāni prajñāyante /
S06pplg1__u:50_28: cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante /
S06pplg1__u:50_30: srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisatvās tathāgatā 'rhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante /
S06pplg1__u:50_31: // āha / tat kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati bhagavān āha /
S06pplg1__u:50_32: [LPG_20v] paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati /
S06pplg1__u:50_33: tat kasya hetoḥ atyantapariśuddhā śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dakṣiṇā /
S06pplg1__u:50_34: tathā hi dāyakaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kasya dāyakaḥ anekeṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ /
S06pplg1__u:50_35: āha / kathaṃ yujyamāno bhagavan bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti veditavyaḥ bhagavān āha /
S06pplg1__u:50_36: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo rūpaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ vedanāśunyatāyāṃ saṃjñāśunyatāyāṃ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ vijñānaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:51_0_0: punar aparaṃ cakṣuḥśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
S06pplg1__u:51_0_1: evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ cakṣurdhātuśunyatāyāṃ rūpadhātuśunyatāyāṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:51_0_2: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotradhātuśunyatāyāṃ śabdadhātuśunyatāyāṃ śrotravijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ ghrāṇadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:51_0_3: gandhadhātuśunyatāyāṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ jihvādhātuśunyatāyāṃ rasadhātuśunyatāyāṃ jihvāvijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ kāyadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:51_0_4: sparśadhātuśunyatāyāṃ kāyavijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ manodhātuśunyatāyāṃ dharmadhātuśunyatāyāṃ manovijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ yukto
S06pplg1__u:51_0_5: yukta iti vaktavyaḥ duḥkhaśunyatāyāṃ samudayaśunyatāyāṃ nirodhaśunyatāyāṃ mārgaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ skandhaśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:51_0_6: dhātuśunyatāyāṃ āyatanaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ avidyāśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:51_0_7: vijñānaśunyatāyāṃ nāmarūpaśunyatāyāṃ [LPG_21r] ṣaḍāyatanaśunyatāyāṃ sparśaśunyatātāyāṃ vedanāśunyatāyāṃ tṛṣṇāśunyatāyām upādānaśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:51_0_8: bhavaśunyatāyāṃ jātiśunyatāyāṃ jarāmaraṇaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmaśunyatāyām yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:51_1: ye kecit saṃjñāgatāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:52_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavya evaṃ
S06pplg1__u:52_0_1: khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:52_1_0: / sa ābhir daśabhiḥ śunyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tāvad yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā
S06pplg1__u:52_1_1: hi sa na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_2: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_3: na rūpam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_4: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_5: na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_6: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_7: na rūpaṃ vedanayā sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_8: na vedanā saṃjñayā na saṃjñā saṃskārair na saṃskārā vijñānena sārdhaṃ samavasarantīti samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_9: na vijñānaṃ saṃskāraiḥ sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_10: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi na sa kaścid dharmaḥ kenacid dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ samavasarati na visarati /
S06pplg1__u:52_11: // na yujyate na viyujyate prakṛtiśunyatām upādāya /
S06pplg1__u:52_12: yā śāradvatīputra rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpaṃ yā vedanāśunyatā na sā vedanā /
S06pplg1__u:52_16: tathā hi śāradvatīputra yā rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpayati /
S06pplg1__u:52_21: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi śāradvatīputrānyad rūpam anyā śunyatā nānyā śunyatānyad rūpam* rūpam eva śunyatā śunyataiva rūpam* evaṃ nānyā vedanānyā śunyatā /
S06pplg1__u:52_22: nānyā saṃjñā nānyā śunyatā / nānye saṃskārā anyā śunyatā /
S06pplg1__u:52_24: nānyā śunyatānyad vijñānaṃ / vijñānam eva śunyatā śunyataiva vijñānaṃ /
S06pplg1__u:52_25: yā śāradvatīputra śunyatā na sā utpadyate na nirudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:52_27: na hīyate na vardhate / nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā yā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:52_29: na hīyate na vardhate / nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā :
S06pplg1__u:52_30_0: na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na cakṣur na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā kāyo na manaḥ na rūpaṃ
S06pplg1__u:52_30_1: na śabdo na gandho na raso na sparśo na dharmāḥ na tatra skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na tatra cakṣurdhātur na rūpadhātur
S06pplg1__u:52_30_2: na cakṣurvijñānadhātur na śrotradhātur na śabdadhātur na śrotravijñānadhātuḥ na ghrāṇadhātur na gandhadhātur na ghrāṇavijñānadhātur
S06pplg1__u:52_30_3: na jihvādhātur na rasadhātur na jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ na kāyadhātur na spraṣṭavyadhātur na kāyavijñānadhātur na manodhātur na
S06pplg1__u:52_30_4: dharmadhātur na manovijñānadhātur na tatrāvidyā nāvidyānirodhaḥ na saṃskārā nna saṃskāranirodhaḥ na vijñānaṃ na vijñānanirodhaḥ
S06pplg1__u:52_30_5: na nāmarūpaṃ na nāmarūpanirodhaḥ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ na sparśo na sparśanirodhaḥ na vedanā na vedanānirodhaḥ
S06pplg1__u:52_30_6: na tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ nopādānaṃ nopādānanirodhaḥ na bhavo na bhavanirodhaḥ na jātir na jātinirodhaḥ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na
S06pplg1__u:52_30_7: jarāmaraṇanirodhaḥ na duḥkhaṃ na samudayo na nirodho na mārgaḥ na prāptir nābhisamayaḥ na srotaāpanno na srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06pplg1__u:52_30_8: na sakṛdāgāmī [LPG_22r] na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmī nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhan nārhatvam* na pratyekabodhir na pratyekabuddhaḥ
S06pplg1__u:52_30_9: na tatra mārgākārajñatā na bodhisatvaḥ na tatra bodhir na buddhaḥ evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:52_30_10: caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_31: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_32: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_33: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_34: na cakṣur yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_35: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyaṃ na mano yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_36: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_37: na śabdaṃ na gandhaṃ na rasaṃ na sparśaṃ na dharmān na cakṣurdhātuṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_38: na rūpadhātuṃ na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ yāvan na manodhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ na manovijñānadhātuṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_39: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_40: na samyakprahāṇeṣu na riddhipādeṣu nendriyeṣu na baleṣu na bodhyaṃgeṣu na mārge yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_41: yāvan na daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu na caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu na catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_42: yāvan na sarvajñatāyāṃ na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:52_43: anenāpi śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmāyogāviyogatām [LPG_22v] upādāya /
S06pplg1__u:52_44: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śunyatāṃ śunyatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:52_45: na śunyatāyogam* nānimittam ānimittena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:52_46: nānimittayogam* nāpraṇihitam apraṇihitena yojayati na viyojayati
S06pplg1__u:52_47_0: / nāpraṇihitayogam / tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śunyatā na yogo na viyogaḥ evam ānimittam apraṇihitaṃ na yogo na viyogaḥ evaṃ
S06pplg1__u:52_47_1: yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
S06pplg1__u:53_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśunyatām avatarati /
S06pplg1__u:53_1: evam avataran na rūpaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:53_2: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:53_3: na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:53_4: tathā hi pūrvāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:53_5: na rūpam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:53_6: tathā hy aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:53_7: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:53_8: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:53_9: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannair yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:53_10: tathā hi pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannāny eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:54_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na pūrvāntam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:54_2: na pratyutpannaṃ pūrvāntenāparāntena vā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:54_3: na pūrvāntam aparāntaṃ vā pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:54_5: // evaṃ hi yuktaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ [LPG_23r] prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:55_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ yujyate yathā yujyamāno na sarvajñatām atītena yojayati tathā hy atītam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:55_3: tathā hy anāgatam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatām anāgatena yojayiṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:55_5: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatāṃ pratyutpannena yojayiṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:55_6: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:56_0_0: punar aparaṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati
S06pplg1__u:56_0_1: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayiṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_1: // evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_2: tathā hi vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_3: yāvan na cakṣuḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_4: tathā hi cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_5: evan na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyan na manaḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_6: tathā hi mana eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_7: evaṃ na rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_8: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_9: evaṃ na śabdagandharasasparśadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_10: tathā hi dharmān eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_11: evaṃ na skandhān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_12: [LPG_23v] tathā hi skandhān eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_13: na dhātūn sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_14: tathā hi dhātūn eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_16: tathā hy āyatanāny eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_17: // na cakṣurdhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_18: tathā hi cakṣurdhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_19: // na rūpadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_20: tathā hi rūpadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_21: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_22: tathā hi cakṣurvijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_23: yāvan na manodhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_24: tathā hi manodhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_25: na dharmadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_26: tathā hi dharmadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_27: na manovijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:56_28: tathā hi manovijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:56_30: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatiputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:57_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:57_1: tathā hi dānapāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:57_2: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāṃ na vīryapāramitāṃ na dhyānapāramitāṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:57_3: tathā hi prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:57_4: evaṃ na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇardhipādendriyabalabodhyaṃgamārgān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:57_5: evan na daśa tathāgatabalāni na catvāri vaiśāradyāni na catasraḥ pratisaṃvida [LPG_24r] nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:57_6: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:57_7: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:58_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na buddhaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:58_1: na sarvajñatāṃ buddhena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:58_2: tathā hi buddham eva na samanupaśyati sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:58_3: na bodhiṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:58_4: na boddhyā sarvajñatāṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:58_5: tathā hi bodhim eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:58_6: sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:58_7: evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:59_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ bhāva iti yojayati na rūpaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:59_1: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na vijñānaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:59_3: na rūpam anityam iti yojayati evan na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nityam iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:59_4: na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati na rūpaṃ sukham iti yojayati na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:59_5: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sukham iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:59_7: na rūpam ātmeti yojayati / na rūpam anātmeti yojayati / evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam ātmeti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:59_11: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti [LPG_24v] yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:59_13: na rūpaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_14: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_15: na rūpaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_16: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_17: na rūpaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_18: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_19: na rūpam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyata iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_20: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyaya iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_23: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannam iti yujyate evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam atītam iti yujyate na vijñānam anāgatam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_25: na rūpaṃ sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_26: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_27: na rūpam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_28: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
S06pplg1__u:59_30: na caratīti nopaiti / caratīti ca na carati ceti nopaiti /
S06pplg1__u:59_31: naiva carati ca na caratīti nopaiti /
S06pplg1__u:59_32: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:60_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:60_1: na dānapāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:60_3: na satvaparipākahetoḥ na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ na daśānāṃ [LPG_25r] tathāgatabalānāṃ kṛte /
S06pplg1__u:60_6: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:60_9: na śunyatāśunyatāyā na mahāśunyatāyā na paramārthaśunyatāyā na saṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nāsaṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nātyantaśunyatāyā /
S06pplg1__u:60_10: nāvarāgraśunyatāyā / nāvakāraśunyatāyā / na prakṛtiśunyatāyā / na svalakṣaṇaśunyatāyā / na sarvadharmaśunyatāyā / nānutpādaśunyatāyā / nābhāvasvabhāvaśunyatāyāḥ kṛte /
S06pplg1__u:60_11: na tathatāyāḥ kṛte / na dharmadhātor na bhūtakoṭeḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:60_12: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya bhedaṃ vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:60_13: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:60_14: / sa na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:60_15: na divyasya śrotrasya na paracittajñānasya na pūrvanivāsānusmṛter nardhipādānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:60_16: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:61_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavaty aham ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā divyena
S06pplg1__u:61_0_1: cakṣuṣā pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi
S06pplg1__u:61_1_0: / evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:61_1_1: lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi na cāsyaivaṃ [LPG_25v] bhavati yat
S06pplg1__u:61_1_2: te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante tat sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śroṣyāmi /
S06pplg1__u:61_2: ahaṃ tatra lokadhātuṣu satvānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ jñāsye /
S06pplg1__u:61_4: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā tāṃ satvāṃś cyavamānān upapadyamānān upapannāṃś ca drakṣyāmi /
S06pplg1__u:61_6: // evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:61_7: / evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate /
S06pplg1__u:61_8: yāny api kānicil laukikalokottarāṇi karaṇīyāni tāny api sarvāṇi pradakṣiṇībhavanty anābhogenāparikalpitāni /
S06pplg1__u:61_9_0: / ye ca te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto ye ca dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād
S06pplg1__u:61_9_1: upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi buddhā
S06pplg1__u:61_9_2: bhagavantas taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam ārakṣanti mā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pated iti /
S06pplg1__u:61_10_0: ye ca catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvamm ārakṣanti mā haiva kaścid bodhisatvasya
S06pplg1__u:61_10_1: mahāsatvasyāntarāyaṃ kārṣīt* ye ca kecit kāyikā rogās te 'pi tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi dharme sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavanti /
S06pplg1__u:61_11: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvān maitryā spharati /
S06pplg1__u:61_12: // evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:62_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ alpakṛcchreṇa dhāraṇīmukha samādhimukhāni pratibhānapratisaṃvinmukhāny āmukhībhavanti /
S06pplg1__u:62_2: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir na kadācid virahito bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:63_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:63_1: asti kaścid dharmo yo dharmaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
S06pplg1__u:63_2: sameti vā na sameti vā / tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hi sa tad dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:63_3: yo yujyeta vā viyujyeta vā / sameyād vā na sameyād vā : evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:64_0_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati * kaccid ahaṃ dharmadhātum
S06pplg1__u:64_0_1: abhisaṃbuddhyeya na vābhisaṃbudhyeya tat kasya hetor na hi dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddho nābhisaṃbudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:64_1: nābhisambhotsyate / evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:65_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcid dharmaṃ dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:65_1: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:66_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dharmadhātor dharmāṇāṃ ca nānākaraṇaṃ karoti /
S06pplg1__u:67_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:67_1: / dharmadhātuṃ pratividhyeya vā na vā pratividhyeya /
S06pplg1__u:67_2: tathā hi sa na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:67_3: yena dharmeṇa yo dharmaḥ pratividhyeta tathā hi na sa dharmadhātuṃ śunyam iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:67_4: nāśunyam iti yojayati / evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ /
S06pplg1__u:68_0: [LPG_26v] punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:68_6: evaṃ na śrotradhātuṃ na śabdadhātuṃ na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ na ghrāṇadhātuṃ na gandhadhātuṃ na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ na jihvādhātuṃ na rasadhātuṃ na jihvāvijñānadhātum /
S06pplg1__u:68_8: na kāyavijñānadhātuṃ / yāvan na manodhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:68_14: eṣa hi śāradvatīputra paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ śunyatāyāṃ śāradvatīputra caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati /
S06pplg1__u:68_16: satvāṃś ca paripācayati / kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ye kecic chāradvatīputra yogāḥ prajñāpāramitāyogas teṣām agrya-m-ākhyāyate /
S06pplg1__u:68_17: śreṣṭha varaḥ pravaraḥ praṇīta-m-ākhyāyate tat kasya hetoḥ anuttara eṣa yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śunyatānimittāpraṇihitayoga /
S06pplg1__u:68_18_0: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyākṛto vaktavyaḥ asannibhūtaś cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ
S06pplg1__u:68_18_1: [LPG_27r] śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāmm arthaṃ karoti na cāsyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ
S06pplg1__u:68_18_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yujye 'ti vā viyujye 'ti vā māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyanty aham āsannībhūto vyākaraṇasya /
S06pplg1__u:68_20: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣye /
S06pplg1__u:68_21: // tat kasya hetos tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na vyatirekīkaroti /
S06pplg1__u:68_22: // na ca dharmadhātoḥ kaṃcid anyadharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:68_23: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cared yo vā buddhair bhagavadbhir vyākṛyeta /
S06pplg1__u:68_25: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na satvasaṃjñotpadyate /
S06pplg1__u:68_26: na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā na jānakapaśyakakārakavedakasaṃjñotpadyate /
S06pplg1__u:68_27: // tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy atyantaṃ satvo nopalabhyate na nirudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:68_28: na hi satvasyotpādo na nirodhaḥ yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ kathaṃ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:68_29: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ satvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:68_33_0: eṣa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ ayaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya
S06pplg1__u:68_33_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ paramo yogaḥ yas tadanyān yogān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati /
S06pplg1__u:68_34: atra ca śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāmaitrīm abhinirharati /
S06pplg1__u:68_35: mahākaruṇāṃ cābhinirharati / atra śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na mātsaryacittam utpādayati /
S06pplg1__u:68_36: na dauḥśīlyacittaṃ na vyāpādacittaṃ na kausīdyacittaṃ [LPG_27v] na vikṣepacittaṃ na dauṣprajñacittam utpādayati /
